name: MADFPSS
description:
Ever wanted to experience Madness Combat in the perspective of a character? Now you can! Introducing, MADFPSS is a First Person Action Shooter inspired and based on the Madness Combat series by Matt "Krinkels" Jolly. Developed on the Unity Engine, MADFPSS attempts to capture the adrenaline pumping action of Madness and put it into a game. This game was made in the last 2-3 weeks, so the quality may not be perfect, but I hope you enjoy playing this game. The WebGL solution Unity provides has unfortunately forced me to make a standalone version rather than a Web version as it has a lot of issues.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Move Camera

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Zoom/Block melee weapon

1,2,3 Buttons - Switch weapons (Primary, Secondary, Melee)

Space - Jump

CTRL - Crouch

Thanks for playing!
